channel.title: Breakfast on Cookbook
channel.description: Recent content in Breakfast on Cookbook

item.title: Breakfast Casserole
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 1 pound ground sausage
  • 1 onion, chopped
  • 1 red bell pepper, chopped
  • 12 large eggs
  • 1/2 cup milk
  • 1 tablespoon hot sauce
  • 1/2 teaspoon salt
  • 1/4 teaspoon black pepper
  • 1 bag frozen potato tots (32 ounce)
  • 1 cup shredded cheese

Notes

Build in miniature with muffin cups for about 24 egg muffins!

Directions

  1. preheat over to 350 degrees
  2. heat a large skillet over medium-high heat
  3. cook sausage until browned and broken up, about 5 minutes
  4. add onion and bell pepper, stirring occasionally, 8-10 minutes
  5. whisk together eggs, milk, hot sauce, salt, and black pepper
  6. arrange tots in an even layer in a greased 3-quart baking dish
  7. top tots with half of the shredded cheese and the sausage mixture
  8. pour egg mixture evenly over tots and top with remaining cheese
  9. bake 40-60 minutes until set in the middle

item.title: Egg Muffins
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 7 eggs
  • 2 cups cottage cheese
  • 1 pound bacon
  • 1 medium onion, diced
  • 1 red bell pepper, diced
  • 2 cups spinach, chopped
  • 1/4 teaspoon black pepper
  • 1 teaspoon garlic powder
  • 1/2 teaspoon cayenne pepper
  • shredded cheese topper

Directions

  1. preheat oven to 375 degrees
  2. cook bacon and cut into small pieces
  3. mix everything together in a large mixing bowl
  4. pour into muffin cups, top with cheese
  5. bake for 20-25 minutes until done (poke with a toothpick)

item.title: French Toast
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 1 cup oat milk
  • 3 large eggs
  • 2 tablespoons honey
  • 1/4 teaspoon salt

Directions

  1. preheat oven to 375 degrees
  2. whisk ingredients together
  3. dip bread 30 seconds each side, move to a cooling rack to sit for 1-2 minutes
  4. cook on griddle over medium-low heat, 2-3 minutes each side
  5. move to oven for storage

item.title: Granola
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 3 cups rolled oats
  • 1 cup slivered almonds
  • 1 cup cashews
  • 3/4 cup shredded sweet coconut
  • 1/4 cup plus 2 tablespoons dark brown sugar
  • 1/4 cup plus 2 tablespoons maple syrup
  • 1/4 cup vegetable oil
  • 3/4 teaspoon salt
  • 1 cup raisins

Directions

  1. preheat oven to 250 degrees
  2. in a large bowl, combine the oats, nuts, coconut, and brown sugar
  3. in a separate bowl, combine maple syrup, oil, and salt
  4. combine both mixtures and pour onto 2 parchment paper lined sheet pans
  5. cook for 1 hour and 15 minutes, stirring every 15 minutes to achieve an even color
  6. remove from oven and transfer into a large bowl; add raisins and mix until evenly distributed

item.title: Mattie Granola
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 2 cups rolled oats
  • 1/4 cup coconut oil
  • 1/4 cup honey
  • 1/4 teaspoon cinnamon
  • 3/4 cup hemp hearts
  • 1/4 cup chopped pecans
  • 1/4 teaspoon salt

Directions

  1. preheat oven to 350
  2. mix all dry ingredients
  3. heat oil and honey in saucepan; mix into dry ingredients
  4. spread onto parchment paper lined baking sheet; sprinkle with salt
  5. check at 15 minutes; bake until perfect level of crispness achieved

item.title: Oat Bars
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 1 1/4 cups peanut butter
  • 1/2 cup honey
  • 3/4 cup shredded coconut
  • 8 teaspoons sunflower seeds
  • 8 teaspoons flax seeds
  • 1/2 cup raisins
  • 2 1/2 cups rolled oats

Directions

  1. melt peanut butter and honey together
  2. mix in everything else except the oats
  3. mix in the oats
  4. flatten out in a square baking dish
  5. refrigerate for 1 hour
  6. slice into bars
  7. refrigerate for another hour
  8. store in an airtight container

item.title: Oatmeal
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 1/2 cup rolled old fashioned oats
  • 1 teaspoon brown sugar
  • 1/4 teaspoon salt
  • other stuff: nuts, coconut, peanut butter powder, cinnamon, go wild

Directions

  1. mix ingredients in a pint jar
  2. prepare by covering with boiling water or microwave

item.title: Waffles
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 2 eggs
  • 2 cups all-purpose flour
  • 1â€‰3/4 cups milk
  • 1/2 cup vegetable oil
  • 1 tablespoon white sugar
  • 4 teaspoons baking powder
  • 1/4 teaspoon salt
  • 1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract

Directions

  1. mix all ingredients in a mixing bowl
  2. cook waffles on a waffle iron
